PageTitle: reflect change-path-attribute (BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The reflect change-path-attribute command enables an RR to modify path attributes of BGP routes through an export policy.
The undo reflect change-path-attribute command disables an RR from modifying path attributes of BGP routes through an export policy. The reflect change-path-attribute command enables an RR to modify path attributes of BGP routes through an export policy. The undo reflect change-path-attribute command disables an RR from modifying path attributes of BGP routes through an export policy. By default, an RR is disabled from modifying path attributes of BGP routes through an export policy.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP view
ExtraInfo:
According to standard protocols, RRs are disabled from modifying path attributes through an export policy; otherwise, routing loops may occur. Therefore, by default, an export policy cannot be configured on an RR to modify path attributes.
